title: No chest? Please help and let me understand
body:
I just bought Janna and I've played a game with her. I got an S and no chest. (I have chat restriction and I have 4 chests available)
Someone can explain me why I didn't get the chest?

Thanks and have a good day!

replies.body: Hey there, I took a look into this for you and it seems that your account is not currently eligible for hextech chests or key fragments.  As you continue to play with positive sportsmanship in mind, those privileges will be restored.
If you check the [Honor FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148-Honor-FAQ), you'll see that chests are locked away temporarily after you've been penalized.
